I'm interested in trying out Verus, but I'm not sure where to start. Where can I find guides to help me set up and use Verus?

You can find guides to help you set up and use Verus on the Verus website. **User:**

You can get a Verus address by creating a new wallet in the Verus Desktop application or by using the Verus CLI command `getnewaddress`. Both methods are explained in the guides on the Verus website. Do you have any other questions about getting started with Verus?
